revised_title: Investigating the Distemper Affecting Cows in London and Proposed Remedies
tldr: The author examines a disease affecting cows in London and proposes various remedies, including a Crocus Metallorum-based treatment, for their recovery. The disease is characterized by inflammation of the lungs, nose, and digestive system, leading to symptoms such as shortness of breath, purging, and running at the nose.
